mapper.update:
update DW_BASEINFO_LINE_OPERATING
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{record.provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHY_LINE_ID = #{record.phyLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_LINE_ID = #{record.operLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_LINE_NAME = #{record.operLineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_ID = #{record.ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_OP_TYPE = #{record.lineOpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_OP_TYPE_CODE = #{record.lineOpTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_STATION = #{record.startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_STATION_ZONE = #{record.startStationZone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
END_STATION = #{record.endStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_STATION_ZONE = #{record.endStationZone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINE_TRANS_PLACE = #{record.lineTransPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_FREQUENCY = #{record.lineFrequency,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINE_MILEAGE = #{record.lineMileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINE_HIGHWAY_MILEAGE = #{record.lineHighwayMileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LINE_OPER_ZONE = #{record.lineOperZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_OPER_ZONE_CODE = #{record.lineOperZoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_COUNTRY_LINE = #{record.isCountryLine,jdbcType=CHAR},
LINE_OP_STATUS = #{record.lineOpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_OP_STATUS_CODE = #{record.lineOpStatusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINE_VALID_DATE = #{record.lineValidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LINE_EXPIRE_DATE = #{record.lineExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ISSUE_DATE = #{record.issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update DW_BASEINFO_LINE_OPERATING set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{record.provinceCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHY_LINE_ID = #{record.phyLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_LINE_ID = #{record.operLineId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_LINE_NAME = #{record.operLineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_ID = #{record.ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_OP_TYPE = #{record.lineOpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_OP_TYPE_CODE = #{record.lineOpTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_STATION = #{record.startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_STATION_ZONE = #{record.startStationZone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, END_STATION = #{record.endStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_STATION_ZONE = #{record.endStationZone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINE_TRANS_PLACE = #{record.lineTransPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_FREQUENCY = #{record.lineFrequency,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINE_MILEAGE = #{record.lineMileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINE_HIGHWAY_MILEAGE = #{record.lineHighwayMileage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINE_OPER_ZONE = #{record.lineOperZone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_OPER_ZONE_CODE = #{record.lineOperZoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_COUNTRY_LINE = #{record.isCountryLine,jdbcType=CHAR}, LINE_OP_STATUS = #{record.lineOpStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_OP_STATUS_CODE = #{record.lineOpStatusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINE_VALID_DATE = #{record.lineValidDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LINE_EXPIRE_DATE = #{record.lineExpireDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISSUE_DATE = #{record.issueDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
a.ID, a.PROVINCE_CODE, a.PHY_LINE_ID, a.OPER_LINE_ID, a.OPER_LINE_NAME, a.OWNER_ID, a.LINE_OP_TYPE, a.LINE_OP_TYPE_CODE, a.START_STATION, a.START_STATION_ZONE, a.END_STATION, a.END_STATION_ZONE, a.LINE_TRANS_PLACE, a.LINE_FREQUENCY, a.LINE_MILEAGE, a.LINE_HIGHWAY_MILEAGE, a.LINE_OPER_ZONE, a.LINE_OPER_ZONE_CODE, a.IS_COUNTRY_LINE, a.LINE_OP_STATUS, a.LINE_OP_STATUS_CODE, a.LINE_VALID_DATE, a.LINE_EXPIRE_DATE, a.ISSUE_DATE,b.OWNER_NAME from DW_BASEINFO_LINE_OPERATING a, DW_BASEINFO_ROADOWNER b
and a.province_code = b.province_code and a.owner_id = b.owner_id
order by ${orderByClause}
